TABLES_LIST: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Tweets (tweet_id text NOT NULL, tweet_text text NOT NULL, user_name text NOT NULL, status text NOT NULL, time DATETIME NOT NULL, admin text, id integer primary key autoincrement);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Errors (error text NOT NULL, time DATETIME NOT NULL, id integer primary key autoincrement);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Tweets_Line (tweet_id text NOT NULL, tweet_text text DEFAULT NULL, media text DEFAULT NULL, sending_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, entities text DEFAULT NULL, id integer primary key autoincrement);
